location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George Herbert Gall, Secretary to the Board of Superintendence, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter discussing the poor state of the horses shipped to India from Bushire on board the Volunteer. Included is a copy of a letter from Thomas Waterman, Captain of the Volunteer, to George Herbert Gall, dated 29 June 1816, describing the condition and treatment of the horses.
